key.name: active-opacity
key.summary: Opacity when topbar is touched by any window

key.name: inactive-opacity
key.summary: Opacity when topbar is not touched by any window

key.name: active-color
key.summary: Color when topbar is touched by any window

key.name: inactive-color
key.summary: Color when topbar is not touched by any window

key.name: active-blended
key.summary: Final color when topbar is not touched by any window

key.name: inactive-blended
key.summary: Final color when topbar is not touched by any window
